column4: I have gdesklets running... but its STILL not what I want... I want like a bar of STREAMING headlines... like stocks, but polotics, world news... anyone have the answer
Mezzo desktop has that. I don't know if they can be added to GNOME desktop though (www.symphonyos.com)
gdesklets would be fine I guess,  I just wish I could find one or two that updated every half hour, CNN headlines are the same ALL DAY!
